ygData.subject: Re: Collapsible fishing pole & Spyglass
ygData.msgSnippet: Check his site again today, he states that the fishing pole was given to him by a GM (through a few other people), so as soon as we figure out how to make that
ygData.messageBody:
Check his site again today, he states that the fishing pole was given to
him by a GM (through a few other people), so as soon as we figure out
how to make that darned pole we are in business!
/Nosferatu

MadGrizzle wrote:
>
> From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
>
> Oh, and Gnomad, if you don't actually have the plans, let us know. Your
> posting suggests that you do have them, but are keeping them secret. I
> still have hope that your website "is" open....
>
> At 08:16 AM 08/10/1999 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: Jake Denley <jaked@...>
> >
> >I was asked by someone to make me a fishing pole yesterday. He said he knew
> >two people who could but they were on another continent. I said I would if he
> >told me the recipe =) But he said they would not reveal it. People know and
> >they are not sharing!@
> >
> >Pharos Darklight
